title: 72styles Infinity Dress with Bandeau, Convertible Bridesmaid Dress, Long, Plus Size, Multi-Way Dress, Twist Wrap Dress
description: ONE SIZE: fits all US 0-16；PLUS SIZE: fits all US 18-24
FREE SEABRA tube top as a gift to you for matching each dress, it can cover lady's back who not willing to expose too much.
SUPPER soft fabric: 4-WAY STRETCH, wrinkle resistant, breathable, rich colors
CONVERTIBLE infinity dress can be worn and created many different styles for any body shapes, the Multiway dresses are the best choice for bridesmaids on the wedding.
OCCASIONS：Bridesmaid Dress, Wedding Party Dress, Evening Dress, Prom Dress, Party Dress,Cocktail Dress, Maternity Dress, Causal Wear, Beach Dress, Homecoming and other various formal occasions.
